name: Sphere Cosmic Arcade
description:
Sphere - A new space arcade game. Can you protect your Sphere?

Features:
- Exciting gameplay! Protect your sphere from malicious attacks of crystals!
- To help use the laser eye-shredder that will help one of the flanking attacks!
- Switch to the plasma energy sphere to eliminate all sorts of crystals!
- Enjoy the atmosphere of a distant galaxy, an excellent music!
